titles.title: A bill to establish a congressionally chartered seaway development corporation in the Arctic, consistent with customary international law, with the intention of uniting Arctic nations in a cooperative Arctic shipping union, where voluntary collective maritime shipping fees will help fund the infrastructural and environmental demands of safe and reliable shipping in the region.
SEAL Act
SEAL Act
Shipping and Environmental Arctic Leadership Act
Shipping and Environmental Arctic Leadership Act
SEAL Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
